s1.ptxt: Clamp the new damper housing set, the side frame gusset, the gusset plate, and the front bulkhead, and measure the front compartment diagonally.

ptxt.sie-ref05: Engine compartment and front floor, under view

s1.ptxt: Temporarily install the front subframe, and check the front suspension position.
Remove the clamped parts and the new front damper extension set.
Do the main welding.Weld the damper housing set (A) to the dashboard upper (B), the hood hinge base (C), and the inner lower pillar (D).
From the passenger's compartment, plug weld the holes in the dashboard lower (A) and the damper housing set (B).
Weld the damper housing set (A) to the front side frame (B) and the front side backplate (C).
Clamp the front damper extension set, and recheck the body dimensions.
Weld the front damper extension set (A) to the dashboard upper side member (B), the damper housing set (C), and the wheelhouse gusset (D).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the side frame gusset (A) to the front side backplate (B).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the gusset plate (A), the side frame gusset (B), front side backplate (C), and the front side frame (D).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the gusset plate (A) and the side frame gusset (B) to the front damper extension set (C).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
NOTE: LHD model is shown; RHD model is symmetrical.
